Directions: In a bowl, combine the squash, 1/4 cup cracker crumbs, 2 tablespoons butter, egg, brown sugar, mustard, salt and pepper; mix well. Pour into a greased 2-1/2-cup baking dish. Combine remaining crumbs and butter; sprinkle over top. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 20 minutes or until a knife comes out clean.
Ingredients: 1 cup mashed cooked acorn or butternut squash
4 tablespoons butter or margarine, melted, divided
